content.1: Now it came to pass in the seventh month,
content.2: Then arose Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and the ten men that were with him, and smote Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan with the sword, and slew him, whom the king of Babylon had made governor over the land.
content.3: Ishmael also slew all the Jews that were with him,
content.4: And it came to pass the second day after he had slain Gedaliah, and no man knew
content.5: That there came certain from Shechem, from Shiloh, and from Samaria,
content.6: And Ishmael the son of Nethaniah went forth from Mizpah to meet them, weeping all along as he went: and it came to pass, as he met them, he said unto them, Come to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam.
content.8: But ten men were found among them that said unto Ishmael, Slay us not: for we have treasures in the field, of wheat, and of barley, and of oil, and of honey. So he forbare, and slew them not among their brethren.
